p: Approach 2: AOD simulated by each of the 13 CMIP5 models was converted to surface PM 2.5 using the same conversion factor η (i.e., PM 2.5/AOD) as has been used to estimate satellite-derived PM 2.5 for the baseline period. Since the space–time variation of η depends on meteorology, consideration of the same η in the future where AOD is simulated from changing emissions as per RCP scenarios implies that the estimated PM 2.5 in future is only governed by the change in emission and not by the meteorology. Difference in the estimated PM 2.5 by these two approaches can isolate the role of meteorology in warming climate in modulating PM 2.5 distribution.
